text: Nabiyow Yallih muxxoo kee kay Racmatta kaamol Suge wannay, tama sinni nafsi gantah tan horta cakki gitak koo makkossam niyatte usun wohut sinni nafsik- sa makkoysaanam maloonuuy, usun tu-kalak hebeltoh iimiy kol Baahoonu waana malon, Yalli Qhuraan kitab kee Cikmat (Nabii Cadiswa kinnuk) kol oobiseeh, duma Aaxige waak Sugtem koo Barse madqooqik, Nabiyow Yallih muxxo kaamol kaxxam Naba wacyi kol oobiseeh isi farmoyta koo Abeemil
